typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sensorTag as string,
		humidity as double,
		temperatureFromHumidity as double,
		objectTemperature as double,
		temperatureFromIr as double,
		pressure as double,
		lux as double,
		currentTime as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		day as string,
		hour as string,
		compkey as string,
		{_lsn} as string,
		{_metadata} as ()
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		compkey
	)) ~> iotdata
iotdata select(mapColumn(
		sensorTag,
		humidity,
		temperatureFromHumidity,
		objectTemperature,
		temperatureFromIr,
		pressure,
		lux,
		currentTime,
		year,
		month,
		day,
		hour,
		compkey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Projection
Projection sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true) ~> LoadtoDatalake
